video: JSON/bollywood_video/Shah Rukh Khan In & As Raees _ Trailer _ Releasing 25 Jan.mp4
movie_details: After street smart kid Raees rises to become Gujarat's bootlegging king in the 1980s, he tries to balance his life of crime with helping his people.

anime1.imgDetails: On a trekking trip, an introvert falls for a charming ex-classmate, whose thirst for adventure drives them apart. Years later, their paths cross again.

anime2.imgDetails: Mumbai shopkeeper Kanji Bhai files a lawsuit against God when an earthquake destroys his store and his insurance policy won't cover the damage.

anime3.imgDetails: After dropping out of the army, a spoiled teenager reenlists and proves his mettle by becoming an officer just as war breaks out.
